text: Hi John, I'm really worried about George's recent financial activity. I know you are working in the bank so think that you may know something.
John, I heard from George that he's been transferring money to a new account. Is this something you're aware of?

John, I'm counting on you to keep an eye on George's transactions. There have been several large, frequent transfers to a new account at Trustworthy Bank (Account No. 3984759387) from his main account at Citywide Bank (Account No. 2837495873). Please let me know if you see anything unusual.
